user_profile.name: Kwame Asante
user_profile.description: Kwame Asante is a 48-year-old academic with extensive experience in technology, navigating the field with a creative flair. Despite his limited mobility, he embraces an impulsive decision-making style, often taking calculated risks that stem from a deep desire to innovate. He is currently managing medication reminders to ensure his health remains a priority amidst his busy schedule, balancing direct communication and professional relationships within an office environment.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily medication reminders for health maintenance
task_specific_attributes.timeline: Immediate implementation for better health management
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: App store or online health resources
additional_requirements: Ability to set reminders via voice commands
Accessibility features for limited mobility users
